useConnectionUrl.description: Do we use a connectionUrl to establish the service?

host.description: A named service for SMTP. (Only needed if enableConnectionUrl is false)

user.description: SMTP username. (Only needed if enableConnectionUrl is false)

pass.description: SMTP password. (Only needed if enableConnectionUrl is false)

from.description: Address for sender. (Only needed if enableConnectionUrl is false)

connectionUrl.description: URL the server can be accessed from. (Only needed if enableConnectionUrl is true)
